name: The Time Traveler
description:
After an unsuccessful theft attempt of the witch's magic crystal, your friend Pedro vanished. In order to get him back and fix your mistake you must find someone, who can take you back in time. You must find The Time Traveler.

Discover

The Time Traveler tells a light-hearted story with many funny and sometimes serious and sad moments.

Meet funny characters, discover their stories, help them or hurt them, create or destroy. It's your choice. But brace yourself - consequences will come.

Explore

Experience an open world, filled with interesting characters, quests, treasures, unique items and more! After you finish the prologue you are free to explore and to do whatever you want in any order you want.

Fight

Take part in real-time dynamic battles. Use your weapons and magic spells like: fireballs, energy attack, health increase and more, to gain advantages in battles.

Customize

Customize the look of your character at the beginning of your journey. Then, choose your own equipment and increase your favourite stats to adjust your character to your play style.

Choose

All actions have their consequences - either long term or short term. You can finish every side quest in more than 3 ways. And every decision you make in this game will affect your ending.

Features:
  • 2+ hours of gameplay
  • emphasis on story
  • choices you make matter
  • EVERY side quest has more than 3 endings
  • dynamic, real-time combat
  • it's not made in RPG Maker
